Scenario:

I have a page: test.jsp?id=${id_value} to test

I have a list of possible value of id number, say 1-400; I wanna load server
with 30 concurrent requests (any time there are 30 requests being processing on
web server, this is NOT 30requests/sec)

I set the thread group to 30 thread number.

I tried to use User Parameter but it will bound ${id_value} at the begining of
thread, in another word, it will only send id = 1 to id =30 and ignoring what I
put user_31 to user_400 ...

If I tried to set thread group's thread number to 1000, it violates the purpose
of test: I wanna 30 concurrent user instead of (1 request/sec for 1000 requests).

Any one can help me out? I checked the User Mannual, it seems uncheck UP's
checkbox "update once per iteration" supposed to work for this case. But I have
tried to put it to different scope with uncheck/check flag... none of it works.

Thanks, James
